dict.acceptation: 爸爸；爹；甜心爸爸（在年轻女子身上乱花钱的阔老头）；老色鬼；

sent.orig: Daddy please daddy don't leave daddy no, stop it!
sent.trans: 爸爸求你，爸爸别走，爸爸，不要，停住！

sent.orig: Old Peter: Daddy! Daddy! Do you hear it? I'm wrong, I come here, now.
sent.trans: 老彼得：爸爸！爸爸！你听见了吗？我错了，我现在来这里了。

sent.orig: Does my wedding gown look pretty, daddy Daddy, don't cry.
sent.trans: 我的婚纱美吗爸爸，爸爸，不要哭。

sent.orig: Daughter: Daddy! Daddy! I got 100 in school today!
sent.trans: 女儿：爸爸！爸爸！我今天得了100分！

sent.orig: Daddy says its like a Coliseum. Daddy says he wants to throw you into Coliseum.
sent.trans: 爸爸说这就像一个竞技场，他还说他想把你扔进竞技场内。
